ComicInfo.Summary:
The fighters of two worlds have been gathered, and the schemes of the demonic Jedah and the angelic Gill are fully revealed! Meanwhile, Blanka finds himself being stalked by a Darkstalker hunter - the maniacal B.B.Hood!
The crossover chaos continues in STREET FIGHTER VS DARKSTALKERS!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Edwin Huang | 1 | B | Cover B | Rob Porter | 2 | C | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover C | Joe Vriens | 3 | *Notes:* The digital edition (7/26/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition. The 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover is a homage of the movie poster for Frankenstein.
